item.title: Lvl req's
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

I already have this:

public int GetCLPrayer(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 14085) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14086) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14087) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Prayer Cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Prayer hood")) { return 99; } return 99; }
and yet a lvl 3 with 1 prayer can wear both prayer cape trimmed, and untrimmed

Read full topic
